entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
